It has Ultra Modern infrastructure with qualified, trained and experienced staff. Centre provides Counseling and treatment free of cost to the patients with the support of Ministry of Social Justice & Empowerment, Govt. of India. This Centre is meant for looking after the Disabled children (suffering from Mental Retardness & Multiple Disabilities), during day time. 17 PWD children are taking services in this centre.
